infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to display your current speed and show your position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to display your current speed and show your position on the map, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to display your current speed and show your position on the map, even when the app is in the background.
